meta.title: Comanfize
common.browser_text: Sorry, your browser is not compatible. Consider updating to enjoy The ANRcade.
common.cta_retail_footnote:
In-store only, while supplies last.
One to a customer, please.
common.share_anrcade_text: Have you played the ANRcade? I loved Repair Racer and all the fun games. Bet you can’t beat me :-) @EsteeLauder #AdvancedNightRepair
common.sharing_text_game1: Think you can beat me at Repair Racer? Check it out in the ANRcade from @EsteeLauder. Easy and fun! #AdvancedNightRepair
common.sharing_text_game2: Smooth moves! I can’t take my eyes off this Smooth Satisfaction game in the @EsteeLauder ANRcade! #AdvancedNightRepair
common.sharing_text_game3: This was a blast! The new Serum Quest game in the @EsteeLauder ANRcade is easy... just try to beat me! #AdvancedNightRepair
common.sharing_text_game4: Let’s bounce: I hereby challenge you to the Beauty Bounce game in the @EsteeLauder ANRcade! It’s easy and fun. #AdvancedNightRepair
el_content.landing_tagline: We build, design and scale revenue organizations.
el_content.decade_1982_text: Estée Lauder invents the world’s first Night Repair Serum
el_content.decade_1991_text: Our first serum to address visible daytime damage from the environment
el_content.decade_2009_text: First with Chronolux™—helps maximize skin’s natural day/night rhythm
el_content.decade_2013_text: New science inspires the first serum with ChronoluxCB™
el_content.game1_benefit_text: With one dropper, skin looks radiant and plumped with hydration. Proven effective for all skintones.
el_content.game2_benefit_text: With Chronolux™ Power Signal Technology, this super serum reduces the look of lines in just 3 weeks.
el_content.game3_benefit_text: 8-hour anti-oxidant protection helps defend against the visible effects of pollution and keep skin looking youthful.
el_content.game4_benefit_text: This multi-recovery serum helps skin boost its natural collagen production for a firmer, bouncier feel.
el_content.bottle_sustainability_text:
NEW
Fast Repair and Youth-Generating Power.

NEW
Skin feels firmer,
pores look minimized.

NEW
Luxury glass bottle.

NEW ADVANCED NIGHT REPAIR
Our Next Revolution in Skincare
gaming.game2_tuto3: Smooth more for a higher score
gaming.game3_tuto2: Move left, right, up or down
gaming.game4_tuto2: Time it for a better bounce
